title: Honor Capsule Disappeared
body:
Hi all,

I logged on today and got the "Keeping It Sportsmanlike" message where you normally get key fragments, except today it said I received an Honor Capsule instead. I looked in my loot but it's nowhere to be found. I'm not sure if this is because of the Hextech Crafting maintenance or if it was just a bug. Anyone else experience anything similar?

replies.body: I am having the same problem. It has happened to me a couple times already. Last time a couple of hours ago when I came to lvl 38. It is really anoying. And to top that I am missing blue essence. also few times already. Last time it also happened a few hours ago I got reworded for finishing this new poro Christmas game and got 250 blue essence. When I went into my loot I had nothing, neether honor capsulo or blue esence. Please deal with this problem
I had this same issue today, I got the message that I had received one, but it never showed up in my inventory.

I'm seeing a few different posts concerning this lately, and it looks like there might have been some weird visual error during the time that the hextech loot was down. I went ahead and double checked your loot totals, and you're currently sitting at the right amounts.
